mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT f.system_source systemSource,f.system_type systemType FROM ${DatabaseName}.hy_car_fault f

SELECT car.CAR_ID AS id, car.CAR_CPH AS plateNum, car.CHASSIS_NUM AS chassisNum, car.STRUCTURE_NUM AS structureNum, car.prod_code AS prodCode, team.T_NAME as tName, car.CAR_TYPE as carType, CASE WHEN car.car_terminal_id IS NOT NULL AND car.car_terminal_id > 0 THEN ter.T_CODE ELSE NULL END AS fkTerCode, CASE WHEN car.car_terminal IS NOT NULL AND car.car_terminal > 0 THEN ter.T_CODE ELSE NULL END AS bdTerCode, IFNULL(ter.t_auto_communication_id, ter.t_communication_id) AS commId, detail.ENGINE_TYPE AS eType, detail.ENGINE_TYPE_REAR AS engineNumber, detail.MB_SALES_STATUS as aakstatus, business.business_name AS businessName, business.LINK_TELPONE AS linkTelpone FROM ${DatabaseName}.hy_car car INNER JOIN ${DatabaseName}.hy_car_detail detail ON car.CAR_ID = detail.CAR_ID INNER JOIN ${DatabaseName}.hy_terminal ter ON ter.T_ID = car.car_terminal INNER JOIN ${DatabaseName}.hy_team team ON car.CAR_TEAM_ID = team.T_ID LEFT JOIN ${DatabaseName}.hy_business business ON business.cid = detail.CAR_OWNER inner join export_car_info cf on cf.car_vin = car.CHASSIS_NUM WHERE car.del_flag = 0 and team.del_flag = 0 AND car.CAR_TERMINAL > 0

SELECT a.prod_code as prodCode, b.tbox_symbol_code as tBoxSymbolCode FROM ${DatabaseName}.hy_car_symbol a LEFT JOIN ${DatabaseName}.hy_symbol_dict b ON a.value_code = b.symbol_code where a.prod_code = #{prodCode} and b.tbox_symbol_code = #{tboxSymbolCode} limit 1

SELECT f.system_source systemSource, f.system_type systemType, f.type_model typeModel, f.fault_des faultDes, f.spn spn, f.fmi fmi, f.fault_solutions as faultSolutions, f.symbol_code as symbolCode FROM ${DatabaseName}.hy_car_fault f

SELECT IFNULL(t.DATA_ID, 0) as id, t.DATA_CODE as code, t.DATA_VALUE as value FROM ${DatabaseName}.hy_basicdata t WHERE t.DATA_TYPE = #{type}
and t.DATA_VALUE not in('金融公司')
mapper.insert: insert into export_car_file (proc_date, file_name, file_size, full_path, create_time, file_type) values (#{procDate}, #{fileName}, #{fileSize}, #{fullPath}, NOW(), #{fileType})
mapper.select: select c.car_vin as vin, c.terminal_id as terminalId from export_car_info c

SELECT IFNULL ( ter.T_AUTO_COMMUNICATION_ID, ter.T_COMMUNICATION_ID ) AS commId, detail.ENGINE_TYPE engineType, car.OIL_CAPACITY oilCapacity, detail.fuel FROM ${DatabaseName}.hy_car car INNER JOIN ${DatabaseName}.hy_terminal ter ON ter.T_ID = IF ( CAR_TERMINAL_ID IS NOT NULL AND CAR_TERMINAL_ID > 0, CAR_TERMINAL_ID, CAR_TERMINAL ) INNER JOIN ${DatabaseName}.hy_car_detail detail ON car.CAR_ID = detail.CAR_ID WHERE car.DEL_FLAG = 0 AND car.CHASSIS_NUM = #{vin} limit 1
